name: Snork (itch)
description:
Your Snork is very hungry!  Can you help him eat all the food without crashing in to the walls?

Use the WASD, ARROW keys or MOUSE to steer Snork around his vivarium.

Please leave your highscores and feedback in the comments below.

Thank you for checking out my game, it means a lot to me :)

Visit me at www.rainfallgames.com
